mhframework.io.net.client

Class MHNetworkClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • mhframework.io.net.client.MHAbstractClient
        • mhframework.io.net.client.MHNetworkClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MHNetworkClient
extends MHAbstractClient
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class can be instantiated by any client application that needs to communicate with a multiplayer server. It simply needs the IP address, and optionally the port number, of the server.
    Author:
    Michael Henson
